title: Sun Moon Lake Cycling & Tea
subTitle: 水沙連的茶香與單車：日月潭環湖慢活
intro: Experience one of the world's most beautiful cycling paths and the rich black tea culture of Yuchi. Perfect for international travelers and families.
transportation: Take **Taiwan Tourist Shuttle (Sun Moon Lake Route)**.

spots.name: Xiangshan Bikeway (向山自行車道)
spots.description: Ride on the water! This section is rated by CNN as one of the world's top 10 most beautiful bikeways. Visit the Xiangshan Visitor Center for its stunning architecture.

spots.name: Lake Cruise (玄光寺/伊達邵)
spots.description: Take a boat to eat 'Grandma's Tea Egg' at Xuanguang Temple and stroll through the Ita Thao aboriginal shopping district.

spots.name: Hohocha (喝喝茶)
spots.description: Learn about Ruby Black Tea (Taiwan Tea No. 18). Experience a traditional tea serving ceremony and buy high-quality tea souvenirs.

title: Garden City & Puli Foodie Tour
subTitle: 花園城市與在地儀式：中興新村x埔里
intro: Explore the nostalgic 'Garden City' of Chung Hsing New Village and dive into Puli's unique culinary rituals.

spots.name: Chung Hsing New Village (中興新村)
spots.description: The former seat of the Taiwan Provincial Government. A well-planned garden city with green tunnels and Baroque-style architecture.

spots.name: Puli Meat Dumpling (埔里肉圓)
spots.description: Experience the local ritual: eat the skin first, then pour the teapot soup into the bowl to finish the meat and sauce.

spots.name: 18 Degree C Chocolate (18度C巧克力工房)
spots.description: Famous for its Nama Chocolate and 'Shokupan' (raw toast). A must-visit spot for dessert lovers.

title: Starry Sky & High Altitude
subTitle: 垂直景觀與星空對話：清境x合歡山
intro: Ascend from 1700m to 3275m. Witness the 'Dark Sky Park' and the magnificent Central Mountain Range.

spots.name: Qingjing Farm (清境農場)
spots.description: Walk on the Skywalk and watch the Sheep Show at Green Green Grassland. Enjoy Yunnan-style cuisine for dinner.

spots.name: Hehuanshan Dark Sky Park (合歡山暗空公園)
spots.description: Take a sunrise bus to Wuling (3275m). Watch the sunrise over the sea of clouds and hike the beginner-friendly Shimen Mountain.

title: Aboriginal Myth & Cable Car
subTitle: 原民神話與空中纜車：日月潭x九族
intro: A 3D land, sea, and air experience. Ride the Michelin 3-star view cable car and immerse yourself in indigenous culture.

spots.name: Ita Thao Pier (伊達邵碼頭)
spots.description: The main settlement of the Thao people. Enjoy street food like millet wine and wild boar sausage by the lake.

spots.name: Formosan Aboriginal Culture Village (九族文化村)
spots.description: Accessible via ropeway. Features authentic reconstructions of indigenous architecture and exciting amusement rides.

title: Mountain & Lake Grand Tour
subTitle: 山盟海誓全覽：清境合歡山x日月潭
intro: The most efficient route connecting Nantou's two biggest international IPs: The high mountains and the alpine lake.

spots.name: Cingjing Skywalk (清境高空觀景步道)
spots.description: Walk among the clouds with a view of the Central Mountain Range before heading to Hehuanshan for stargazing.

spots.name: Sun Moon Lake SUP (日月潭立槳)
spots.description: After descending from the mountains, enjoy a peaceful SUP session on the calm waters of Sun Moon Lake.

spots.name: Maolan Mountain Trail (貓囒山步道)
spots.description: Visit the Tea Research and Extension Station to see historic Japanese tea factories and enjoy panoramic lake views.

title: Cloud Hometown & Tribal Secrets
subTitle: 雲的故鄉與部落秘境：武界x雙龍
intro: For explorers seeking non-touristy paths. Discover the 'Home of Clouds' in Wujie and the rainbow suspension bridge.

spots.name: Wujie Tribe (武界部落)
spots.description: Trace the river to Momonar Waterfall. See the 'Red Azolla' covering the riverbed (seasonal) and the historic Wujie Dam.

spots.name: Shuanglong Rainbow Suspension Bridge (雙龍瀑布七彩吊橋)
spots.description: The longest suspension bridge in Taiwan. Walk across the colorful bridge deep into the canyon to see the twin waterfalls.
